name: appcache-buddy
title: App Cache Buddy

title: Markdown
description: Display comment blocks with rendered markdown

title: MDN Lookup

title: Prefixr

name: StringConvert
title: StringConvert
description: String conversion extension for the Adobe Brackets Web Editor

name: togist
title: ToGist
description: A simple brackets extension to easily create a Github Gist from the current text selection.
